label: 七道
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: The seven circuit highways, each of which led out from the kinai to a different region of the realm. They included the Tōkaidō, Tōsandō, Hokurikudō, San'indō, San'yōdō, Nankaidō, and Saikaidō. [機内、東海道、東山道、北陸道、山陰道、山陽道、南海道、西海道]
